00020 /*! 
00021 
00022 \page txt2cnvchp_description Writing genotype results to a "multi-data" CHP file.
00023 
00024 This program is provided as an example of using the Fusion SDK to write genotype results to an Affymetrix
00025 "multi-data" CHP file. The multi-data CHP file was designed to store a variety of Affymetrix results,
00026 including genotypes and copy number. The Genotyping Console software currently uses the "multi-data" CHP
00027 file for storing genotype results from the BRLMM-P and Birdseed algorithms as well as copy number results
00028 from its copy number algorithms.
00029 
00030 The program is implemented as a command line application. The arguments specify items such as the TSV file
00031 containing the genotype results, algorithm parameters, summary statistics, probe array type, parent CEL file, 
00032 and other items that are stored in the CHP file header.
00033 
00034  */
00035 
00036 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00037 #include <windows.h>
00038 #endif
00039 //
00040 #include "calvin_files/converters/chp/src/CmdLine.h"
00041 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCELData.h"
00042 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCHPData.h"
00043 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCHPMultiDataData.h"
00044 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/GenericFileReader.h"

00046 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/StringUtils.h"
00047 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter.h"
00048 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/CalvinCHPMultiDataFileWriter.h"
00049 #include "calvin_files/writers/src/GenericDataHeaderUpdater.h"

00059 #pragma warning(disable: 4996)

00062 using namespace std;

00069 static void GetCNVCHPParentHeaderFromCEL(string celFile, CHPMultiDataData *data)
00070 {
00071         // Store the CEL header
00072         if (celFile.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(celFile.c_str()) == true)
00073         {
00074                 FusionCELData cel;
00075                 cel.SetFileName(celFile.c_str());
00076         cel.ReadHeader();
00077             GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00078             if (gdata != NULL)
00079                         data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr()); 
00080             cel.Close();
00081         }
00082 }
00083 
00084 static void GetCNVCHPParentHeaderFromCNCHP(string cnvchpFile, CHPMultiDataData *data)
00085 {
00086         // Store the CNCHP header
00087         if (cnvchpFile.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(cnvchpFile.c_str()) == true)
00088         {
00089                 FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(cnvchpFile);
00090         FusionCHPMultiDataData *dchp = FusionCHPMultiDataData::FromBase(chp);
00091         if (dchp != NULL)
00092                 {
00093                         GenericData *gdata = dchp->GetGenericData();
00094                         if (gdata != NULL)
00095                         {
00096                                 GenericDataHeader pHeader = *gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00097                                 if(pHeader.GetParentCnt() > 0)
00098                                 {
00099                                         data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(pHeader.GetParent(0));
00100                                 }
00101                                 else
00102                                 {
00103                                         throw 0;
00104                                 }
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107         delete chp;
00108         }
00109 }

00111 /*! Create a "multi-data" CHP file with just the header information. The remainder of the file
00112  * will be created at a later time using the buffer writer technique.
00113  * The CHP file will contain only "genotyping" results.
00114  * @param execId The execution identifier. This identifier is used to identify the batch run that created the CHP files.
00115  * @param celFile The full path to the parent CEL file. The header of the CEL file is copied to the CHP file.
00116  * @param outFile The name of the output CHP file.
00117  * @param extraColNames The names of the extra data columns. Should not include probe set name, call and confidence columns.
00118  * @param extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.
00119  * @param numEntries The number of rows (entries) of results to store in the CHP file.
00120  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00121  * @param algName The name of the algorithm used to create the results.
00122  * @param algVersion The algorithm version.
00123  * @param chipType the chip type, also known as the probe array type.
00124  * @param programName The name of the program used to create the CHP file.
00125  * @param programVersion The version of the program.
00126  * @param programCompany The company or institution who developed the CHP creating software.
00127  * @param paramNames A list of parameter names to store in the CHP file header.
00128  * @param paramValues A list of parameter values to store in the CHP file header.
00129  * @param sumNames A list of summary statistic names to store in the CHP file header.
00130  * @param sumValues A list of summary statistic values to store in the CHP file header.
00131  * @param execGUID A AffymetrixGUID type for holding the execGUID. This is so each batch of files processed all have the same exec guid.
00132 */
00133 static void CreateFileWithHeader
00134 (
00135         const string &execId,
00136         const string &celFile,
00137         const string &outFile,
00138         const vector<string>& extraColNames,
00139         const vector<string>& extraColTypes,
00140         unsigned long numEntries,
00141         int maxProbeSetNameLength,
00142         const string &algName,
00143         const string &algVersion,
00144         const string &chipType,
00145         const string &programName,
00146         const string &programVersion,
00147         const string &programCompany,
00148         const string &mapFile,
00149         const string &regionsFile,
00150         const vector<string>& paramNames,
00151         const vector<string>& paramValues,
00152         const vector<string>& sumNames,
00153         const vector<string>& sumValues,
00154         const vector<string>& extraNames,
00155         const vector<string>& extraValues,
00156         const MultiDataType &chpDataType,
00157         const ParameterNameValueTypeList& datasetParams //BO,
00158 //BO    const AffymetrixGuidType& execGUID
00159 )
00160 {
00161         // Create the vector of extra columns. The sample code here supports only float, 32 bit integers and 8 bit unsigned integers.
00162         vector<ColumnInfo> extraColumns;
00163         int ncols = (int)extraColNames.size();
00164         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00165         {
00166                 if (extraColTypes[icol] == "float")
00167                 {
00168                         FloatColumn fcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00169                         extraColumns.push_back(fcol);
00170                 }
00171                 else if (extraColTypes[icol] == "int")
00172                 {
00173                         IntColumn intcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00174                         extraColumns.push_back(intcol);
00175                 }
00176                 else if (extraColTypes[icol] == "ubyte")
00177                 {
00178                         UByteColumn ubcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00179                         extraColumns.push_back(ubcol);
00180                 }
00181                 else
00182                 {
00183                         throw string("Unsupported column type: ") + extraColTypes[icol];
00184                 }
00185         }
00186 
00187         // Create the data object
00188         CHPMultiDataData *data = new CHPMultiDataData(outFile);
00189     data->SetEntryCount(chpDataType, numEntries, maxProbeSetNameLength, extraColumns);
00190         data->SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algName));
00191         data->SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algVersion));
00192         data->SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(chipType));
00193 
00194         if(chpDataType == CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType)
00195         {
00196                 string cnvchpFile = celFile;
00197                 GetCNVCHPParentHeaderFromCNCHP(cnvchpFile, data);
00198         }
00199         else
00200         {
00201                 GetCNVCHPParentHeaderFromCEL(celFile, data);
00202         }
00203 
00204         // Add algorithm parameters to list.
00205     ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
00206     ParameterNameValueType param;
00207     
00208         if (programName.empty() == false)
00209         {
00210                 param.SetName(L"program-name");
00211                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programName));
00212                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00213         }
00214 
00215         if (programVersion.empty() == false)
00216         {
00217                 param.SetName(L"program-version");
00218                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programVersion));
00219                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00220         }
00221 
00222         if (programCompany.empty() == false)
00223         {
00224                 param.SetName(L"program-company");
00225                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programCompany));
00226                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00227         }
00228 
00229         if(chpDataType == CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType)
00230         {
00231                 //map file
00232                 param.SetName(L"affymetrix-param-map-file");
00233         param.SetValueAscii(mapFile);
00234                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00235 
00236                 //regions file
00237                 param.SetName(L"affymetrix-param-regions-file");
00238         param.SetValueAscii(regionsFile);
00239                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00240 
00241                 //apt exec guid
00242                 /*param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-apt-exec-guid");
00243                 param.SetValueAscii(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00244                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);*/
00245         }
00246 
00247         int nparams = (int) extraNames.size();
00248         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00249         {
00250                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraNames[iparam]));
00251         param.SetValueAscii(extraValues[iparam]);
00252         data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00253         }
00254 
00255         nparams = (int) paramNames.size();
00256         param.SetName(L"exec-guid");
00257 //BO - Just use the execID passed in on the cmdline
00258 //      if(chpDataType == CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType)
00259 //      {
00260 //              param.SetValueAscii(execGUID);
00261 //              param.SetValueAscii(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00262 //      }
00263 //      else
00264 //      {
00265                 param.SetValueAscii(execId);
00266 //      }
00267 
00268         params.push_back(param);
00269         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00270         {
00271                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(paramNames[iparam]));
00272         param.SetValueAscii(paramValues[iparam]);
00273         params.push_back(param);
00274         }
00275         if (params.empty() == false)
00276                 data->AddAlgParams(params);
00277 
00278         params.clear();
00279         nparams = (int) sumNames.size();
00280         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00281         {
00282                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(sumNames[iparam]));
00283         param.SetValueAscii(sumValues[iparam]);
00284         params.push_back(param);
00285         }
00286         if (params.empty() == false)
00287                 data->AddSummaryParams(params);
00288         
00289         //Add dataset parameters specific to the multi data chip type
00290         if(datasetParams.empty() == false)
00291         {
00292                 DataSetHeader *dsh = data->GetDataSetHeader(chpDataType);
00293                 for (ParameterNameValueTypeList::const_iterator it=datasetParams.begin(); it!=datasetParams.end(); it++)
00294             dsh->AddNameValParam(*it);
00295         }
00296 
00297         // Creating the writer object will create the file with the header information.
00298         CHPMultiDataFileWriter writer(*data);
00299 }
00300 
00301 /*! Convert a call to a code
00302  * @param call The call, or can be a code
00303  * @return The code
00304  */
00305 static int CallToCode(const string &call)
00306 {
00307         if (isdigit(call[0]) != 0)
00308         {
00309                 return atoi(call.c_str());
00310         }
00311         else
00312         {
00313                 if (call == "AA" || call == "aa")
00314                         return SNP_AA_CALL;
00315                 else if (call == "AB" || call == "ab")
00316                         return SNP_AB_CALL;
00317                 else if (call == "BB" || call == "bb")
00318                         return SNP_BB_CALL;
00319                 else
00320                         return SNP_NO_CALL;
00321         }
00322 }
00323 
00324 /*! Parse a line into a list.
00325  * @param line The line of data
00326  * @return A list of strings from the line (separated by tabs).
00327  */
00328 static list<string> ParseLine(char *line)
00329 {
00330         list<string> tokens;
00331         const char *sep = "\t";
00332         char *token = strtok(line, sep);
00333         while (token != NULL)
00334         {
00335                 tokens.push_back(token);
00336                 token = strtok(NULL, sep);
00337         }
00338         return tokens;  
00339 }
00340 
00341 /*! Adds the genotype results to the CHP file. This function uses the buffer writer object
00342  * to write the data to the CHP file.
00343  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00344  * @param outFile The name of the output CHP file.
00345  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00346  * @param extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.
00347  */
00348 static void AddFileBody(const string &inFile, const string &outFile, int maxProbeSetNameLength, const vector<string>& extraColTypes)
00349 {
00350         // Create the buffer writer object
00351         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter genotypeEntryBufferWriter;
00352         vector<string> fileNames;
00353         fileNames.push_back(outFile);
00354     vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00355     dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00356     map<MultiDataType, int> maxLen;
00357     maxLen[GenotypeMultiDataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength;
00358         genotypeEntryBufferWriter.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxLen);
00359 
00360         // Open the file
00361         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00362         if (!instr)
00363                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00364 
00365         // First line with header
00366         char line[1024];
00367         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00368 
00369         // Get the data
00370         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00371 
00372         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData entry;
00373         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00374         {
00375                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00376                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00377 
00378                 entry.name = *colIt;
00379                 ++colIt;
00380                 entry.call = CallToCode(*colIt);
00381                 ++colIt;
00382                 entry.confidence = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00383                 ++colIt;
00384 
00385                 entry.metrics.resize(cols.size() - 3);
00386                 int colIdx = 0;
00387                 for (; colIt!=cols.end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00388                 {
00389                         if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00390                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00391                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00392                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00393                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00394                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00395                 }
00396                 genotypeEntryBufferWriter.WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00397         }
00398 
00399         //Flush the buffer. The destructor will close the file.
00400         genotypeEntryBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00401 }
00402 
00403 /*! Adds the copy number results to the CHP file. This function uses the buffer writer object
00404  * to write the data to the CNCHP file.
00405  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00406  * @param outFile The name of the output CNCHP file.
00407  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00408  * @param extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.
00409  */
00410 static void AddFileBodyCNCHP(const string &inFile, const string &outFile, int maxProbeSetNameLength, const vector<string>& extraColTypes)
00411 {
00412         // Create the buffer writer object
00413         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter copyNumberEntryBufferWriter;
00414         vector<string> fileNames;
00415         fileNames.push_back(outFile);
00416     vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00417     dataTypes.push_back(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00418     map<MultiDataType, int> maxLen;
00419     maxLen[CopyNumberMultiDataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength;
00420         copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxLen);
00421         
00422         // Open the file
00423         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00424         if (!instr)
00425                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00426 
00427         // First line with header
00428         char line[1024];
00429         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00430 
00431         // Get the data
00432         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00433 
00434         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData entry;
00435         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00436         {
00437                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00438                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00439 
00440                 entry.name = *colIt;
00441                 ++colIt;
00442                 entry.chr = (u_int8_t)atof(colIt->c_str());
00443                 ++colIt;
00444                 entry.position = (u_int32_t)atof(colIt->c_str());
00445                 ++colIt;
00446 
00447                 entry.metrics.resize(cols.size() - 3);
00448                 int colIdx = 0;
00449                 for (; colIt!=cols.end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00450                 {
00451                         if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00452                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00453                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00454                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00455                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00456                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00457 
00458                 }
00459                 copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.WriteMultiDataCopyNumberEntry(CopyNumberMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00460         }
00461 
00462         //Flush the buffer. The destructor will close the file.
00463         copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00464 }
00465 
00466 static float GetNumFromCalculation(long start, long end, time_t time, int row)
00467 {
00468         long num = end - start;
00469         if(num <= 0)
00470                 num = 100;
00471         return (time / (float)num)/++row;
00472 }
00473 
00474 static float GetSignal(float signal)
00475 {
00476         int nSignal = signal;
00477         signal = signal - nSignal;
00478         nSignal = nSignal % 3;
00479         signal = nSignal + signal ;
00480         if(signal < 0.25)
00481                 signal = 0.25;
00482         if(signal > 3)
00483                 signal = 3;
00484         return signal;
00485 }
00486 
00487 static int GetCall(float call)
00488 {
00489         int nCall = call;
00490         nCall = nCall % 5;
00491         if(nCall < 0)
00492                 nCall = 0;
00493         if(nCall > 4)
00494                 nCall = 4;
00495         return nCall;
00496 }
00497 
00498 static float GetAllele(float allele)
00499 {
00500         int nAllele = allele;
00501         allele = allele - nAllele;
00502         if(allele == 0.0)
00503                 allele = (nAllele % 2) * 1.0;
00504         if(allele < 0)
00505                 allele = 0;
00506         if(allele > 1)
00507                 allele = 1;
00508         return allele;
00509 }
00510 
00511 static float GetConfident(float confident)
00512 {
00513         int nConfident = confident;
00514         confident = confident - nConfident;
00515         confident = confident / 1.8;
00516         if(confident < 0)
00517                 confident = 0;
00518         if(confident > 0.5)
00519                 confident = 0.5;
00520         return confident;
00521 }
00522 
00523 /*! Adds the copy number results to the CHP file. This function uses the buffer writer object
00524  * to write the data to the CNVCHP file.
00525  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00526  * @param outFile The name of the output CNCHP file.
00527  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00528  * @param extraColTypes The types (float, int, ubyte) of the extra columns.
00529  */
00530 static void AddFileBodyCNVCHP(const string &inFile, const string &outFile, int maxProbeSetNameLength, const vector<string>& extraColTypes)
00531 {
00532         // Create the buffer writer object
00533         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter copyNumberEntryBufferWriter;
00534         vector<string> fileNames;
00535         fileNames.push_back(outFile);
00536     vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00537     dataTypes.push_back(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType);
00538     map<MultiDataType, int> maxLen;
00539     maxLen[CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength;
00540         copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxLen);
00541         
00542         time_t seconds = time(NULL);
00543         int clk = clock();
00544         if(clk == 0) clk = 1;
00545         seconds = (seconds/1000) * clk;
00546 
00547         // Open the file
00548         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00549         if (!instr)
00550                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00551 
00552         // First line with header
00553         char line[5000];
00554         instr.getline(line, 5000);
00555 
00556         // Get the data
00557         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00558 
00559         ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionData entry;
00560         int row = 0;
00561         while (instr.getline(line, 5000))
00562         {
00563                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00564                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt = cols.begin();
00565                 entry.name = *colIt;
00566                 ++colIt;
00567                 ++colIt;
00568                 long start = atol(colIt->c_str());
00569                 ++colIt;
00570                 long end = atol(colIt->c_str());
00571                 float randomNum = GetNumFromCalculation(start, end, seconds, row);
00572                 entry.signal = GetSignal(randomNum);
00573                 entry.call = (u_int8_t)GetCall(randomNum);
00574                 entry.confidenceScore = GetConfident(randomNum);
00575                 copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.WriteMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionEntry(CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00576                 row++;
00577         }
00578 
00579         //Flush the buffer. The destructor will close the file.
00580         copyNumberEntryBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00581 }
00582 
00583 /*! Reads the genotype results from a simple TSV text file.
00584  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00585  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00586  */
00587 static unsigned long ReadData(const string &inFile, int &maxProbeSetNameLength)
00588 {
00589         // Open the file
00590         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00591         if (!instr)
00592                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00593 
00594         // First line with header
00595         char line[1024];
00596         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00597 
00598         // Get the data
00599         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00600 
00601         // count keeps track of the number of rows. This now handles what used to be the data list size
00602         // given we do not read and store the data in the list anymore, we needed this value for later
00603         // see the main function for how count is used from the return of this fuction.
00604         unsigned long count = 0;
00605         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00606         {
00607                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00608                 maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) cols.begin()->size());
00609                 ++count;
00610         }
00611         return count;
00612 }
00613 
00614 /*
00615  * Store the start index and count of probe sets for the given chromosome.
00616  */
00617 static void SetChromosomeProbeSetIndexInformation(ParameterNameValueTypeList &params, int chr, unsigned long start, unsigned long count)
00618 {
00619         ostringstream str;
00620         str << (int) chr;
00621         wstring schr = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(str.str());
00622         ParameterNameValueType param;
00623         param.SetName(schr + L":start");
00624         param.SetValueInt32(start);
00625         params.push_back(param);
00626         param.SetName(schr + L":count");
00627         param.SetValueInt32(count);
00628         params.push_back(param);
00629         param.SetName(schr + L":display");
00630         param.SetValueAscii(ChromosomeToString(chr));
00631         params.push_back(param);
00632 }
00633 
00634 /*! Reads the copy number results from a simple TSV text file.
00635  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00636  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00637  * @param datasetParams The list of parameters that form the part of the dataset header.
00638  */
00639 static unsigned long ReadCNData(const string &inFile, int &maxProbeSetNameLength, ParameterNameValueTypeList &datasetParams)
00640 {
00641         // Open the file
00642         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00643         if (!instr)
00644                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00645 
00646         // First line with header
00647         char line[1024];
00648         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00649 
00650         // Get the data
00651         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00652 
00653         // count keeps track of the number of rows. This now handles what used to be the data list size
00654         // given we do not read and store the data in the list anymore, we needed this value for later
00655         // see the main function for how count is used from the return of this fuction.
00656         unsigned long count = 0;
00657         int lastChr = -1;
00658         unsigned long chrRowCount = 0;
00659         unsigned long start = 0;
00660         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00661         {
00662                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00663                 list<string>::iterator colsIt = cols.begin();
00664                 maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) colsIt->size());
00665                 ++colsIt;
00666                 int chr = atoi(colsIt->c_str());
00667                 // If there is a new chromosome, save the details of the previous one.
00668                 if(lastChr != chr)
00669                 {
00670                         if(lastChr != -1)
00671                                 SetChromosomeProbeSetIndexInformation(datasetParams, lastChr, start, chrRowCount);
00672                         
00673                         lastChr = chr;
00674                         start = count;
00675                         chrRowCount = 0;
00676                 }
00677                 ++chrRowCount;
00678                 ++count;
00679         }
00680         SetChromosomeProbeSetIndexInformation(datasetParams, lastChr, start, chrRowCount);
00681 
00682         return count;
00683 }
00684 
00685 /*! Reads the copy number variation results from a simple TSV text file.
00686  * @param inFile The name of the input TSV file.
00687  * @param maxProbeSetNameLength The maximum length of the probe set names.
00688  * @param datasetParams The list of parameters that form the part of the dataset header.
00689  */
00690 static unsigned long ReadCNVData(const string &inFile, int &maxProbeSetNameLength, ParameterNameValueTypeList &datasetParams)
00691 {
00692         // Open the file
00693         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00694         if (!instr)
00695                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00696 
00697         // First line with header
00698         char line[5000];
00699         instr.getline(line, 5000);
00700 
00701         // Get the data
00702         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00703 
00704         // count keeps track of the number of rows. This now handles what used to be the data list size
00705         // given we do not read and store the data in the list anymore, we needed this value for later
00706         // see the main function for how count is used from the return of this fuction.
00707         unsigned long count = 0;
00708         int lastChr = -1;
00709         unsigned long chrRowCount = 0;
00710         unsigned long start = 0;
00711         while (instr.getline(line, 5000))
00712         {
00713                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00714                 list<string>::iterator colsIt = cols.begin();
00715                 maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) colsIt->size());
00716                 ++count;
00717         }
00718 
00719         return count;
00720 }

00740 cout << "-out C:\\CnChpdata1k.chp" << endl;

00748 
00749 static void ReadFile(const string &celFile)
00750 {
00751         // Store the CEL header
00752         if (celFile.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(celFile.c_str()) == true)
00753         {
00754                 FusionCELData cel;
00755                 cel.SetFileName(celFile.c_str());
00756         cel.ReadHeader();
00757             GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00758             if (gdata != NULL)
00759                 {
00760                         *gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr(); 
00761                 }
00762             cel.Close();
00763         }
00764 }
00765 
00766 static string GetOutputFile(string cnchpFile)
00767 {       
00768         string chchpFileToLower = cnchpFile;
00769         int pos = cnchpFile.rfind('\\');
00770         string filePath = cnchpFile.substr(0, pos);
00771         string fileName = cnchpFile.substr(pos + 1, cnchpFile.length() - pos);
00772         pos = fileName.find('.');
00773         fileName = fileName.substr(0, pos);
00774         return filePath + "\\" + fileName + ".CNVCHP";
00775 }
00776 
00777 static void GetFiles(string *dirPath, string searchExtension, vector<string>& list)
00778 {
00779         string path = dirPath->c_str();
00780         dirPath->append("\\").append(searchExtension);
00781         list.clear();
00782     WIN32_FIND_DATA fd;
00783         HANDLE findHandle = ::FindFirstFileA(dirPath->c_str(), &fd);
00784     if(findHandle == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00785         return;
00786     do
00787     {
00788         if(fd.dwFileAttributes & FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY)
00789         {
00790             continue;
00791         }
00792                 list.push_back(path + "\\" + fd.cFileName);
00793     } while(::FindNextFileA(findHandle, &fd) != 0);
00794 
00795     ::FindClose(findHandle);
00796 }
00797 
00798 /*! The main entrance to the program. */
00799 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
00800 {
00801         try
00802         {
00803 
00804                 // Parse the command line arguments.
00805                 CCmdLine cmdLine;
00806                 if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00807                 {
00808                         show_help();
00809                         exit(-1);
00810                 }
00811 
00812                 string mapFile = "";
00813                 string regionsFile = "";
00814 
00815                 string execId = cmdLine.GetArgument("-execid", 0);
00816                 string celFile = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-cel", 0, "");
00817                 string inFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-in", 0);
00818                 string chpType = cmdLine.GetArgument("-chpType", 0);
00819                 string arrayType = cmdLine.GetArgument("-arrayType", 0);
00820                 string algName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algName", 0);
00821                 string algVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algVersion", 0);
00822                 string programName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programName", 0);
00823                 string programVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programVersion", 0);
00824                 string programCompany = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programCompany", 0);
00825 
00826                 if(chpType == "CopyNumberVariation")
00827                 {
00828             mapFile = "c:\\cnv\\cnvmap.hg18.bed";
00829                         regionsFile = "c:\\cnv\\cnvregions.hg18.regions";
00830                 }
00831 
00832                 vector<string> colNames;
00833                 int n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-colNames");
00834                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00835                         colNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-colNames", i));
00836 
00837                 vector<string> colTypes;
00838                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-colTypes");
00839                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00840                         colTypes.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-colTypes", i));
00841 
00842                 vector<string> paramNames;
00843                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramNames");
00844                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00845                         paramNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramNames", i));
00846 
00847                 vector<string> paramValues;
00848                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramValues");
00849                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00850                         paramValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramValues", i));
00851 
00852                 vector<string> sumNames;
00853                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumNames");
00854                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00855                         sumNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumNames", i));
00856 
00857                 vector<string> sumValues;
00858                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumValues");
00859                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00860                         sumValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumValues", i));
00861 
00862                 vector<string> extraNames;
00863                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-extraNames");
00864                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00865                         extraNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraNames", i));
00866 
00867                 vector<string> extraValues;
00868                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-extraValues");
00869                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00870                         extraValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraValues", i));
00871 
00872                 vector<string> inputFiles;
00873                 if(chpType == "CopyNumberVariation")
00874                 {
00875                         string cnchpDir = celFile;
00876                         GetFiles(&cnchpDir, "*.cnchp", inputFiles);
00877                 }
00878                 else
00879                 {
00880                         inputFiles.push_back(celFile);
00881                 }
00882 
00883                 for(int iFile = 0; iFile < inputFiles.size(); iFile++)
00884                 {
00885                         celFile = inputFiles[iFile];
00886                         string outFile = "";
00887                         if(chpType == "CopyNumberVariation")
00888                                 outFile = GetOutputFile(celFile);
00889                         else
00890                                 outFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-out", 0);
00891 
00892                         // Read the TSV input file
00893                         int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00894                         MultiDataType chpDataType ;
00895                         if(chpType == "Genotype" ||  chpType == "")
00896                                 chpDataType = GenotypeMultiDataType;
00897                         else if(chpType == "CopyNumber")
00898                                 chpDataType = CopyNumberMultiDataType;
00899                         else if(chpType == "CopyNumberVariation")
00900                                 chpDataType = CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType;
00901 
00902                         // data collection is no longer used, so we have ReadData return the row count so that we can pass it into
00903                         // CreateFileWithHeader call
00904                         unsigned long rowCount =0;
00905                         ParameterNameValueTypeList datasetParams;
00906 
00907                         if(chpDataType == GenotypeMultiDataType)
00908                                 rowCount = ReadData(inFile, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00909                         else if(chpDataType == CopyNumberMultiDataType)
00910                                 rowCount = ReadCNData(inFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, datasetParams);
00911                         else if(chpDataType == CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType)
00912                                 rowCount = ReadCNVData(inFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, datasetParams);
00913                         
00914                         // Create the CHP file.
00915                         // Creates the header
00916                         CreateFileWithHeader(execId, celFile, outFile, colNames, colTypes, rowCount, maxProbeSetNameLength,
00917                                 algName, algVersion, arrayType, programName, programVersion, programCompany, mapFile, regionsFile, paramNames, paramValues,
00918                                 sumNames, sumValues, extraNames, extraValues, chpDataType, datasetParams);//BO, execGUID);
00919 
00920                         //// add the body (data)
00921                         if(chpDataType == GenotypeMultiDataType)
00922                                 AddFileBody(inFile,outFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, colTypes);
00923                         else if(chpDataType == CopyNumberMultiDataType)
00924                                 AddFileBodyCNCHP(inFile,outFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, colTypes);
00925                         else if(chpDataType == CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType)
00926                                 AddFileBodyCNVCHP(inFile,outFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, colTypes);
00927                 }
00928         }
00929         catch (string s)
00930         {
00931                 cout << s << endl;
00932                 show_help();
00933         }
00934         catch (int e)
00935         {
00936                 cout << "Invalid argument" << endl;
00937                 show_help();
00938         }
00939         catch (...)
00940         {
00941                 cout << "Unknown error" << endl;
00942                 show_help();
00943         }
00944         return 0;
00945 }
